alert.note: Alert for Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hertford County through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aulander, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ahoskie, Winton, Cofield, Harrellsville, Union, Tunis, Earleys, Menola, Newsome Store, Oak Villa, Saint John, Millennium, Proctors Corner, Poor Town, Brantleys Grove and Chowan Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
